extracted_information: The platform provides powerful calculators and analysis tools for Houston developers, focusing on data-driven insights and market intelligence.

features.name: ROI Calculator
features.description: Calculates potential returns on Houston development projects.

features.name: Market Dashboard
features.description: Provides real-time market data and trends for Houston neighborhoods.

features.name: Zoning Explorer
features.description: Offers interactive zoning maps and regulation lookup.

features.name: Financing Calculator
features.description: Compares financing options and estimates monthly payments.

features.name: Development Timeline
features.description: Enables creation of Gantt charts for project planning with Houston-specific phases.

features.name: Cost Calculator
features.description: A tool to calculate development costs.

features.name: Neighborhood Comparison
features.description: A tool for comparing different neighborhoods.

features.name: Opportunity Finder
features.description: A tool to find development opportunities.

features.name: Market Intelligence Hub
features.description: A central hub for market intelligence.
